Package virophage.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientLobbyScreen  
    ConnectionDialog  
    CreditsScreen
    A screen which holds the credits.
    GameClient
    GameClient is responsible for (among other things), the GUI of the game.
    GameScreen
    A GameScreen is a GUI component that renders the game.
    InstructionScreen
    A screen which holds instructions.
    LobbyScreen
    A screen that holds a 'lobby', or a listing of players.
    MenuScreen
    A MenuScree presents a user with the instructions and an option to start.
    Selection
    A Selection represents the active selection a user has.
    TextScreen
    A TextScreen represents a screen of the game with text on it.
